title: WordPress Analytics - Check whether a website is built with WordPress and various information
content:
WordPress Analytics (www.wp-data.com) is a free online tool that checks whether a website is built with WordPress and analyzes information such as the theme, plugins, and hosting service being used. It is especially useful for developers, designers, and marketers who want to understand the technology stack of competitors or reference websites.

üîç Main Features
	1.	WordPress Detection
‚Ä¢ Automatically detects if the entered URL is a WordPress website.
	2.	Theme & Plugin Analysis
‚Ä¢ Identifies and lists the WordPress themes and plugins used on the site.
	3.	Hosting Service Information
‚Ä¢ Estimates and displays the site‚Äôs hosting provider.
	4.	Agency Info Registration
‚Ä¢ Allows users to add or edit agency information shown in the analysis.
	5.	Multilingual Support
‚Ä¢ Available in multiple languages including Korean, English, Japanese, Chinese, and Vietnamese.

üõ† How to Use
	1.	Visit www.wp-data.com
	2.	Enter the URL of the website you want to analyze (e.g., https://example.com)
	3.	Click the ‚ÄúAnalyze‚Äù button to view information such as WordPress usage, theme, plugins, and hosting.

üéØ Use Cases
‚Ä¢ Understand the tech stack of reference sites and apply it to your own projects.
‚Ä¢ Benchmark competitors by checking which themes and plugins they use.
‚Ä¢ Manage your agency portfolio by registering your agency‚Äôs information.

WordPress Analytics (www.wp-data.com) is a simple and convenient tool that requires no installation or login. It is highly useful for quickly retrieving technical information about WordPress-based websites. However, since it is based on publicly available data, some plugins or customized elements may not be detected accurately.

title: eSender - Virtual Phone Number SMS Service
content: eSender is a virtual phone number service that provides Chinese and Hong Kong phone numbers through WeChat. Here are the key points about eSender: - **eSender** : **www.esenderchina.com** ## 1. Purpose: - It allows users to receive SMS verification codes and messages from Chinese/Hong Kong services without needing a physical SIM card - Particularly useful for people who need to register for Chinese services (like financial services, e-shopping, etc.) that require a Chinese phone number for verification ## 2. Key Features: - Works through WeChat official account - Provides virtual phone numbers for both China and Hong Kong - Allows unlimited SMS reception - No need to change physical SIM cards - Supports sending SMS for registration on Chinese websites - Real-name registration is required (following telecom regulations) ## 3. How it works: - Users follow the eSender WeChat official account - Register with required information (including passport details for real-name verification) - Receive a virtual phone number - Can receive SMS messages directly through WeChat ## 4. Pricing: - Offers various subscription periods (30 days, 90 days, 180 days, 360 days) - China number prices start from 28 HKD (approximately 3.60 USD) for 30 days - Hong Kong number prices start from 18 HKD (approximately 2.30 USD) for 30 days eSender is particularly useful for international users who need to access Chinese services that require local phone numbers for verification purposes, without having to physically obtain a Chinese SIM card. - **eSender** : **www.esenderchina.com**
